```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(outbreaks)
data("measles_hagelloch_1861")

head(measles_hagelloch_1861)

#Quantidade de pessoas com erupção cutânea reportadas por dia
dates_rash <- table(measles_hagelloch_1861$date_of_rash)

dates_rash <- data.frame(Date = format(as.Date(names(dates_rash)), '%d/%m/%Y'), Frequency = as.vector(dates_rash))


dates_rash
dates_rash$Date <- factor(dates_rash$Date, ordered = T)

ggplot(dates_rash) +
  geom_point(aes(x = Date, y = Frequency)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

```
